events.title: Cat Adoption Day
events.description: Animal Kingdom is hosting a cat adoption day on the 34th of August. Come and adopt a furry friend!

events.title: Concert Night
events.description: Join us for a night of music and entertainment, featuring top local artists.

events.title: Football Tournament
events.description: Come and support your favorite team in a day-long football tournament. Refreshments will be available.

events.title: Workshop on Entrepreneurship
events.description: Learn from experienced entrepreneurs on how to start and run a successful business.

events.title: Camping Trip
events.description: Join us for a weekend of camping and outdoor activities. Fun for the whole family!
